body.p:
New Liberty Ky
Aug 19th 1863
His Excellency James F. Robinson
Govedrnor of Kentucky
Sir

At the Term of the Carroll Circuit Court a judgment was rendered in favor of the Commonwealth of Ky vs Lewis E Krutz for selling Liquor without a License -- There happened an interim between after from the expiration of his License to the procurement of another for which he was fined --

His neighbors have sent a petition to your Honor praying a remittance of the fine -- Mr. Krutz is a poor man with a large family of helpless children & is a Loyal Union man -- He is now a resident of Owen County -- If not incompatible with the interest of the state it would be an act of charity & mercy to remit his fine

Respty your svt
J. B, English --
